name: Ama
text: Ama Josephine Budge is a London based science fiction/art writer, curator and organiser, co-founder of Black queer clubnight the Batty Mama, and convener of I/Mages of Tomorrow anti-conference, Ama's art and and the spaces she curates create critical utopias where gender-non-conforming black human and non-human life can flourish.
